params.taskDescription: If Apple Inc. releases a new iPhone, then customers will buy it. Customers did not buy a new iPhone. Therefore, Apple Inc. did not release a new iPhone.

params.taskDescription: In the animated movie Toy Story, if Paul Newman turned down the role of voicing Woody, then Tom Hanks was chosen for the role. Tom Hanks was chosen as the voice for Woody, therefore, Paul Newman turned down the role of voicing Woody in Toy Story.

params.taskDescription:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>p</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">→<!-- → --></mo>
  <mi>q</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">p \to q</annotation></semantics></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>q</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">→<!-- → --></mo>
  <mi>r</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">q \to r</annotation></semantics></math>. <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mo>∴<!-- ∴ --></mo>
  <mi>p</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">→<!-- → --></mo>
  <mi>r</mi>
  <mo>.</mo>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\therefore p \to r.\,</annotation></semantics></math>

params.taskDescription: If all people are created equal, then all people are the same with respect to the law. If all people are the same with respect to the law, then justice is blind. Therefore, if all people are created equal, then justice is blind.

params.taskDescription: If Robin Williams was a comedian, then some comedians are funny. No comedians are funny. Therefore, Robin Williams was not a comedian.

questionSetStimulus: For the following exercises, analyze the argument and identify the form of the argument as the law of detachment, the law of denying the consequent, the chain rule for conditional arguments, or none of these.
